document_data.name: Laelran Aelorothi
document_data.mainbody: '''Laelran Aelorothi''' was a [[fey'ri]] [[conjurer]] of [[House Aelorothi]] of [[Siluvanede]] and a member of the [[daemonfey]] in the late 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: As a fey'ri, Laelran had the unique powers to cast ''[[dimension door]]'' and ''[[suggestion]]'' once a day each, and was resistant to fires and electricity.
document_data.Relationships: Laelran had a [[quasit]] familiar, [[Noxit]], who helped him in his deception.
document_data.Activities: ''Circa'' [[1370 DR]], Laelran posed as an aspiring male [[human]] [[wizard]] called '''Sorndyrn Scarletsash''' and joined the [[Arcane Brotherhood]] of [[Luskan]] in order to keep an eye inside the organization.
